Dialogue.Page: Where'd that come from? That was super random, hah. Gabbro really loves fooling around, don't they? I guess this must be some kind of tradition between the travelers.
What game did you play to have to pay that penalty, anyway?

DialogueOption.Text: Hide and seek. They hid a stone somewhere on an island for me to find.

Dialogue.Page: Island? You mean somewhere on Timber Hearth? Or did they like.. sneak you into their ship on a trip to Giant's Deep some time ago?
Anyways, Gabbro's Gabbro. You know how lazy they can be - that was the whole joke about that penalty! I'm sure they didn't actually do much to actually hide it.

Well, see if you can ask for a rematch after you take off, and get them to tell Hornfels you're the most experienced and knowledgable astronaut that has learnt everything about the star system after you win!
I'm.. <Pause/> not saying you're dumb, just that today is literally your first day on the job.
Alright, take care out there, buddy! Better luck next time with the game!
